property.name: Text
property.value: When you confront this card's Problem, if you have a Troublemaker at that Problem, turn this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you move this card from home to a Problem, you may pay 1AT to move another one of your Friends from home to that Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you confront this card's Problem with more power than required, turn this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: When one of your Friends here would be dismissed, you may put that Friend on top of your deck instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you confront this card's Problem, if none of your opponent's Friends are at that Problem, turn this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your opponent needs +1 power to confront this card's Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you win a faceoff involving this card, turn this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: During a faceoff involving this card, if you would put a flipped Event card on the bottom of your deck, you may put it into your hand instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you score at least 2 points with this card during one Score Phase, turn this card over.

property.value: Your opponent must pay +1AT to move a character to this card's Problem.

property.value: Reaction: When one of your Resources is dismissed, you may dismiss this card. If you do, play that Resource from your discard pile for free.

property.value: Play on a Problem. Your opponent may not play Friends with 2 power or less to this Problem.

property.value: Play on a Friend. This Friend has Stubborn.

property.value: At the end of each player's Troublemaker Phase, that player moves one of their characters home from this card's Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of your opponent's Troublemaker Phase, this card permanently gets +1 power. When this card has 8 power, frighten all your opponent's Friends at its Problem and dismiss this card.

property.value: At the start of your opponent's Troublemaker Phase, they exhaust one of their characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card is uncovered, its owner must pay 2AT or dismiss it. Your opponent must pay +2AT to play a Friend to this card's Problem.

property.value: During faceoffs involving this card, flip an additional card.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of your opponent's Troublemaker Phase, they discard a random card.

property.name: Text
property.value: While a player has at least 3 [Kindness] Friends at this Problem, that player's opponent must pay +1AT to play a Friend here.

property.name: Text
property.value: When a player confronts this Problem, that player's opponent discards a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: The first player to confront this Problem may put a Friend with 1 power from their discard pile into their hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: The first player to confront this Problem may dismiss a Resource on an opponent's Friend here.

property.name: Text
property.value: When a player defeats a Troublemaker here, that player may move a character involved in the faceoff.

property.name: Text
property.value: Players with at least 2 Pegasus characters at this Problem get +1 total power during faceoffs here.

property.name: Text
property.value: The first player to confront this Problem may look at the top card of this Problem deck and put it on either the top or bottom of that deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Resources played on characters here have their costs reduced by 1AT.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this Problem is played, each player draws a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this Problem is played, each player discards a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When a player wins a faceoff here by exactly 1 power, that player scores an additional point.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Dismiss one of your Friends here to gain 1AT. Any player may activate this ability.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the beginning of a player's Score Phase, if that player has at least 2 [Loyalty] characters, that player may ready a card at home.

property.name: Text
property.value: When a player defeats a Troublemaker at this Problem, that player scores an additional point.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this Problem is played, its owner may search their deck for a Critter Friend, reveal it, put it into their hand, and shuffle their deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: If there are at least 3 [Generosity] characters at this Problem, characters without [Generosity] can't move away from this Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: When a player moves a [Laughter] character to this Problem, if they have a [Laughter] character here already, they may draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Report Resources played on this Problem have their costs reduced by 1AT.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this Problem is played, each player frightens an opponent's Friend.

property.name: Text
property.value: When a player wins a Problem faceoff here, they may look at the top 3 cards of this Problem's deck and put them back in any order.

property.name: Text
property.value: When a player confronts this Problem, that player may draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: If a card flipped for a Problem faceoff here would be put on the bottom of its owner's deck, it is put into its owner's discard pile instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this Problem is played, each player may search their deck for a Troublemaker, reveal it, put it into their hand, and shuffle their deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Friends with less than 2 power can't be played to this Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: While a player has more power at this Problem than any opponent, that player's Friends here can't be dismissed.

property.name: Text
property.value: When a player confronts this Problem, they frighten one of their Friends at this Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this Problem is played, its owner may move one of their Critter Friends here from home for free.

property.name: Text
property.value: The first player to confront this Problem with a [Honesty] character with at least 3 power scores an additional point.

property.name: Text
property.value: The first player to play a Friend to this Problem gains 2AT.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card is put into the discard pile from anywhere, you may search your deck for Dr. Hooves, play it to your home frightened for free, and shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you play this card to a Problem, you may move up to 3 of your Friends to that Problem for free.

property.name: Text
property.value: During faceoffs involving this card, flip an additional card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: When you flip a card, exhaust this card to ignore that card and flip another card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After your opponent draws a card, exhaust this card to draw 2 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your opponents can't confront this card's Problem unless they have at least 3 characters at that Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: While this card is at a Problem, you may exhaust this card and put it into your hand. If you do, move up to 2 of your opponent's characters home.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Exhaust this card to draw 2 cards, then put a card from your hand on top of your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your opponent must pay +2AT to move a character to or from this card's Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you confront this card's Problem, you may move this card home to score points equal to that Problem's bonus.

property.name: Text
property.value: Whille this card is at a Problem, your other Friends at that Problem get the Critter trait during any Score Phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: While this card is at a Problem, each of your other [Kindness] characters at that Problem gets +1 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. Faceoff Reaction: When you win a faceoff, you may dismiss this card to gain 4AT.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card is uncovered, all players discard their hands and draw 3 cards. At the start of each player's Troublemaker Phase, that player discards a random card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you play this card to a Problem, you may banish a Troublemaker there. When this card leaves that Problem, put that banished Troublemaker into play at a Problem and uncover it.
